statements: SELECT * FROM user_data_deletion_requests;
SELECT user_id, request_date FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE deletion_status='pending';
SELECT request_id, user_id, deletion_status FROM user_data_deletion_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE deletion_status='completed';
SELECT user_id, request_date FROM user_data_deletion_requests LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE request_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, deletion_status FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE deletion_status = 'pending';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM user_data_deletion_requests;
SELECT * FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE deletion_status = 'completed' ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM user_data_deletion_requests GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT request_id, user_id, request_date FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE deletion_reason = 'GDPR Compliance';
SELECT request_id, status, processing_date FROM deletion_request_status WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT user_id, deletion_reason FROM user_data_deletion_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, status FROM deletion_request_status ORDER BY processing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, deletion_reason FROM user_data_deletion_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM deletion_request_status WHERE status = 'pending' AND processing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS request_count FROM user_data_deletion_requests GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY request_count DESC;
SELECT udr.request_id, udr.user_id, drs.status FROM user_data_deletion_requests udr INNER JOIN deletion_request_status drs ON udr.request_id = drs.request_id ORDER BY udr.request_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data_deletion_requests;
SELECT request_id, user_id, status FROM user_data_deletion_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, reason FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT log_date, action_taken FROM user_data_deletion_logs WHERE log_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT audit_id, user_id, action_performed FROM user_data_deletion_audit_logs WHERE user_id=123 ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT request_id, user_id, request_date FROM user_data_deletion_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT reason FROM user_data_deletion_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT uddr.request_id, uddl.log_date, uddl.action_taken FROM user_data_deletion_requests uddr INNER JOIN user_data_deletion_logs uddl ON uddr.request_id = uddl.request_id;

SELECT uddl.log_id, udda.user_id, udda.audit_date, uddl.additional_notes FROM user_data_deletion_audit_logs udda INNER JOIN user_data_deletion_logs uddl ON udda.log_id = uddl.log_id WHERE udda.action_performed = 'deleted';
SELECT * FROM UserData WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserData WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT request_id, request_date FROM UserRequests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM RequestLogs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT deletion_id, data_type FROM DataDeletion WHERE deletion_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserRequests WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM UserData WHERE user_id=1001;
SELECT log_date, description FROM RequestLogs WHERE request_id=2002 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, deletion_date FROM DataDeletion WHERE data_type='Profile' LIMIT 5;
SELECT request_id, user_id, request_date, status FROM UserRequests WHERE status='Approved' ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_personal_data;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_personal_data ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM deletion_requests WHERE status='pending';
SELECT user_id, date_of_birth FROM user_personal_data WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_personal_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_personal_data WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, date_of_birth FROM user_personal_data WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT u.full_name, d.requested_at, l.action_taken FROM user_personal_data u JOIN deletion_requests d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN deletion_logs l ON d.request_id = l.request_id;
SELECT d.request_id, d.status, l.action_taken FROM deletion_requests d LEFT JOIN deletion_logs l ON d.request_id = l.request_id WHERE l.log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.full_name, v.verification_code FROM user_personal_data u JOIN user_verification v ON u.user_id = v.user_id WHERE v.verification_status = 'verified';
